translation.boolPrompt: You have to answer with yes or no.
translation.welcomeMsg1: Welcome to Insurance Buddy , I am your Personal  Insurance Assistant.
translation.welcomeMsg2: I can fetch your policy details ,  Create a new  Claim or Create a new Policy.  What  can I do  for you today?
translation.orAPolicy: or Purchase a  New Insurance Policy
translation.errorMsg: oops something wen wrong , Please try again
translation.helpPolicy: I can help you with your policy details. I can get you different information such as the Premium Details , Premium Due date, Frequency of payment , Last payment , No. of premiums paid , Expiry date , Policy Benefits , Your local branch address, Contact person , Email  policy details or premium details or  premium certificate . Please let me know what you need.
translation.ThankYouFromInsuranceBuddy: Thank you from Insurance Buddy , take care
translation.WeSorry: oops i did not get that
translation.contactCustomerSupport: We do have an offline purchase option  .  Please call our Call center 24 by 7 at  1800 5500 2200
translation.claimPolicyDef:
Claim - an application for compensation under the terms of an insurance policy. 

  Policy - a written agreement for insurance between an insurance company and a person who wants cover from unforeseen incident.
translation.ClaimWelcomeP1: I was able to fetch your claim details it is still in open status
translation.ClaimWelcomeP2: What details can I fetch regarding your claim ? Say HELP  to listen to all the Claim options
translation.GiveMeClaimNumber: Please provide me your claim number
translation.ClaimStatusOptions: I can also tell your about the last comments on the claim
translation.LastCommentOptions: I can also tell you the Loss Date of the Claim
translation.LossDateOptions: I can also tell you the No of Invoices generated so far
translation.NoOfInvoicesOptions: I can also tell you the department you claim is residing in
translation.GiveMePolicyNumber: Please provide me your policy number
translation.PolicyWelcomeP1: I can see that you have a policy with
translation.PolicyWelcomeP2: What details can I fetch regarding your policy ? Say HELP  to listen to all the Policy options
translation.PolicySummaryOptions: I can also tell your about your Policy  start date ,  expiry  date or the premium details.
translation.NextPremium1: Your next premium due date is on
translation.NextPremiumOptions: Do you want to know When did you pay my last premium ?
translation.LastPremium3: dollars which was done via the internet banking facility
translation.LastPremiumOptions: Would yoou also like to know your premium amount?
translation.PremiumAmount2: dollars  and the due date is 27th December 2019
translation.PremiumAmountOptions: Are you interested in knowing how many premiums you have paid so far ?
translation.HowManyPremiums2: premiums as of today while your Policy commenced on 12th of Febuary 2018
translation.HowManyPremiumsOptions: I can also tell you when the policy is expiring so that you can renew it on time.
translation.PolicyExpiryOptions: In case you want to know the nearest branch , I can find that for you.
translation.NearestBranch2: or  feel free to  call us at 1800 0101 0202
translation.NearestBranchOptions: And by the way , would you like to know your Relationship manager?
translation.RelationshipManager2: and you can meet him at your local branch.
translation.RelationshipManagerOptions: I think it will help if I can tell you when is your next premium due . What do you think ?
translation.EmailPolicySummary: <Music> An Email has been sent mailtoshiva@gmail.com with your Policy Details
translation.EmailPolicySummaryOptions: I can also send you the Premium Summary
translation.EmailPremiumSummary: <Music> An Email has been sent mailtoshiva@gmail.com with your Premium Summary
translation.EmailPremiumSummaryOptions: How about the premium certificate..I guess I will mail that too <pause>
translation.EmailPremiumCertificate: <Music> An Email has been sent <Customer Email> with your Premium Certificate
translation.EmailPremiumCertificateOptions: Is there anything else with which I can help you? Please say HELP . If you wish to leave, please say GOODBYE
translation.InMercShowroom: We see you are in a MERCEDES Car Showroom and conducted a payment transaction
translation.DidYouBuyaCar: Have you bought a new car
translation.congratsOnMerc: Congratulations on your new Mercedes S Class
translation.hasPreinstalledTelematics: We are aware that your car comes with a pre-installed Telematics device along with state-of-the-art safety features
translation.shallIGetTheQuote: Shall i go ahead and get the  insurance quote for  your new car...?
translation.getPermissionToAccessDetails: For fetching the policy details  I would need your consent to get access to your personal records
translation.healthReport: I see from your  health records  that you are on medication for  hypertension
translation.drivingReport: Thankfully your driving record has come out clean
translation.proceedToGetQuote: Do you want me to proceed to the generation of quote
translation.additionalFeaturesYouCanOpt: there are additional features you can opt for
translation.BreakDownResuce: Do you need Break down rescue cover for an additional charge of 90 dollars
translation.Replacementlockcover: Do you need Replacement lock cover  for additional charge of  80 dollars
translation.finalPremium: Your final premiums  including taxes  is
translation.useDefaultCreditCard: Can i continue using your default credit card
translation.yesToProceed: Please place your thumb on the phone and Say Yes to  proceed
translation.noPaymentNoPolicy: You cannot buy a policy without a authentication the payment
translation.yourPolicyNumberIs: Your car insurance policy number is
translation.physicalCopy: Physical copy of  your insurance policy documents will reach you within 5 - 7 working days
translation.getLocation: Pin pointing your location and checking your records with us
translation.accidentNotification: We received a notification from your Cars telematics   Device  that you have had an accident
translation.GladYouAreOk: I am glad to hear that you are ok
translation.pinPointingYourCar: We have identified the current location of your car
translation.InformedPoliceAndSendingDrone: We have informed Local Police about the accident
translation.PhotosSentHelpInvestigation: The Photos sent by Drone will help us assess the situation and help us take our next course of action
translation.droneTakePictures: It would take pictures of the accident
translation.canWeTakePictures: Can  it take pictures of the accident to help us in our investigation ?
translation.AmbulanceCarOntheWaay: Ambulance and our team are on their way to reach you
translation.recievedPhotosFromDrone: We have received photos from the drone
translation.assessedSituation: We have analysed the intensity of the damage. would you like to tow the vehicle?
translation.canWeBookTowTruck: Can we go ahead and book a tow truck...?
translation.SendingPerson: We are sending a person to inspect the vehicle
translation.takeFewMinutes: Please note it might take few minutes...
translation.bookingaTowTruck: Booking a tow truck for you
translation.bookingUber: to facilitate your appointments  I also have booked a  car to take you to your destination
translation.dontForgetCarKeys: Please hand over keys of the damaged vehicle with the tow truck driver
translation.uberHasArrived: An alternate car has arrived for your convenience
translation.didYouGetIntoTheCar: Mr Shiv , Did you get into the car
translation.sentClaimDetailstoEmail: We have raised a claim on your behalf and  details have been sent to your email
translation.keepPostedOnCar: We will keep you posted on the status of your car
translation.getIntoTheCar: Please get into the car to safely reach your destination
